io.name: TCISSCAI0011501_INBOUND
io.data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:p="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" xmlns:tns="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/" targetNamespace="http://schemas.jmims.com/mms/io/"> <element name="root" type="tns:TCISSCAI0011501_inbound" /> <complexType name="TCISSCAI0011501_inbound"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="niceDataGroup" type="tns:NICE_DATA_GROUP_TYPE"> <annotation> <documentation>NICE데이터</documentation> <appinfo> <p:level value="1" /> </appinfo> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="NICE_DATA_GROUP_TYPE"> <sequence> <element name="mngNo"> <annotation> <documentation>관리번호</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="bsicDt"> <annotation> <documentation>기준일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="rowSeq"> <annotation> <documentation>행순번</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="setlGbcd"> <annotation> <documentation>결산구분코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="1" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="relcoNm"> <annotation> <documentation>관계사명</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="관계사명" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="40" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="relcoCd"> <annotation> <documentation>관계사코드</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="관계사코드" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="6" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="estbDt"> <annotation> <documentation>설립일자</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="설립일자" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="8" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="bizCntn"> <annotation> <documentation>사업내용</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="사업내용" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="50" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="setlYr"> <annotation> <documentation>결산년도</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="결산년도" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="4" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="setlMm"> <annotation> <documentation>결산월</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="결산월" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="string"> <maxLength value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="saleAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>매출금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="매출금액" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="nprftAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>순이익금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="순이익금액" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="alcRt"> <annotation> <documentation>배당율</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="배당률" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="decimal"> <totalDigits value="7" /> <fractionDigits value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="capt"> <annotation> <documentation>자본금</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="자본금" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="mslCapt"> <annotation> <documentation>자기자본금</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="자기자본(자본총계의 의미로 사용)" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="oprftAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>경상이익금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="경상이익금액" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="astTotAmt"> <annotation> <documentation>자산총금액</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="자산총금액" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="long"> <totalDigits value="11" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="sheRate"> <annotation> <documentation>지주비율</documentation> <appinfo> <p:description value="지주비율" /> <p:mandatory value="N" /> <p:level value="2" /> <p:encryption value="N" /> <p:one_path_encp value="N" /> <p:mask_type /> <p:db_key value="N" /> <p:krn_fld_yn value="N" /> </appinfo> </annotation> <simpleType> <restriction base="decimal"> <totalDigits value="7" /> <fractionDigits value="2" /> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
